content: blueberry hat copyright notice you have permission to sell your finished items but please give credit to the designer photographs contained in this document are the property of julivia you are not allowed to use them for self-promotion or listings you must take your own pictures of the product rewriting reselling distributing translating or copying the pattern itself in full or in part is prohibited julivia com © julivia all rights reserved before you start 2 thank you i bet you can t wait to slip this project on your hook by choosing this pattern you ve embarked on a delightful journey of creating something truly special for a little human in your life i want to express my deepest gratitude for your support and trust in my designs it brings me immense joy to share this passion with you making memories stitch by stitch crochet is more than just a craft it s a way to weave love warmth and creativity into every stitch as you embark on this project i hope it brings you countless hours of joy and relaxation each stitch you create carries with it the potential to make memories that will last a lifetime i encourage you to embrace your unique style and add personal touches making every piece a true reflection of your creativity stay inspired and informed i d be thrilled to have you as part of our newsletter community it s not just about staying in touch it s about enriching your crochet experience with julivia sign up for my newsletter for new pattern drops crochet tips and subscriber-only offers www julivia com/pages/newsletter let s be social i would love to see your julivia masterpieces connect with me on social media to join a vibrant community of crochet lovers share your completed projects get inspired by others and be part of the ever-growing family of crafters who share a passion for bringing joy to the world one stitch at a time @juliviacrochetstudio @juliviacrochetstudio @juliviacrochetstudio reach out with questions if you have any questions or need assistance while working on this pattern i m here to help feel free to reach out to me anytime at hello@julivia com i am more than happy to provide guidance clarification or simply celebrate your progress your success and satisfaction are incredibly important to me happy crocheting and warmest wishes bri julivia com © julivia all rights reserved tah yrrebeulb materials yarn worsted weight yarn size medium 4 3 we used canadiana by patons 3 5 oz/100 g 205 yd/187 m navy see sizing chart for amount hook size u s h/8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge other tools scissors 6 stitch markers darning needle measuring tape abbreviations blo back loop only chain chain us terms half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together invisible decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es chainless this is simply a single_crochet at the start of a row or a round for which special starting single_crochet there is
